name: Knighty Night (ChickenCognition)
description:
Travel to the evil goblins castle, and defeat him at all costs!     (Hints Below!)

LOUD SOUND WARNING! This games music was optimized for my laptop, and is extremely loud on everything else.

This game was created in 2 days as a part of the ICT Game Jam!

Credits:

Ty Foster: Coding/Level Design  |  Travis Foster: All Pixel Art/Animations  

"Adventure Meme" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

"Call to Adventure" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Hints:

Level 1: Cut the rope on top of the hill with your sword to lower the bridge across the river.

Level 3: Keep hitting the tree with your body to knock it over and cross the river (it doesn't give any feedback, so you just have to trust me that it's doing something)
